title: Lily

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Look pretty, forcing a player to target you instead of anyone else. They cannot perform negative actions on you.
- Look even prettier. This convinces your target to get close, allowing you to poison them.

desc:
Post 3681
*And first on the arena, the poisonous multi-colored flower, Lily!*
*Woooooo!*
